headline.main: Ideas & Trends; A Genetic Link Is Identified For Some Ulcers A Shift of Tactics On Generic Drugs Abortion Law Further Refined Reconsidering The Libel Laws Sperm Banks Win New Acceptance Churches Qualify Grant Program

docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Jan. 9--Actions that Government officials said were aimed at saving consumers as much as $400 million a year on prescription drugs were begun by Federal regulatory agencies today.

headline.main: U.S. AGENCIES BACK GENERIC DRUGS' USE IN BID TO CUT COSTS; Major Action Includes Publication by the F.D.A. of 'Equivalents' of 2,400 Brand Products Ban on Lists Sought A Generic Drug Drive Begun by U.S. in Costs Fight

docs.abstract: FTC and HEW, in effort to save consumers as much as $400 million a yr on prescription drugs, promote use of cheaper generic drugs; major action includes publication by FDA of compendium of 2,400 prescription drugs listed by their generic names that agency considers to be med equivalents of brand-name products; lawsuits are being filed seeking to ban widespread publication of such lists, and prolonged legal challenge by pharmaceutical indus appears certain; HEW Sec Califano por (M)
docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Jan. 9--Actions that Government officials said were aimed at saving consumers as much as $400 million a year on prescription drugs were begun by Federal regulatory agencies today.

byline.original: By RICHARD D. LYONS Special to The New York Times

docs.lead_paragraph: A SURPRISING variant of the proposition that you are what you eat is being explored as a promising strategy for dealing with some forms of memory impairment, which is among the most distressing, difficult and common afflictions of old age.

headline.main: Memory Loss Curbed By Chemical In Foods; Chemical Curbs Memory Losses

docs.abstract: Article on use of choline to improve memory of elderly; notes substance is found in egg yolks, meat and fish; drawing (L)
docs.snippet: A SURPRISING variant of the proposition that you are what you eat is being explored as a promising strategy for dealing with some forms of memory  impairment, which is among the most distressing, difficult and common afflictions of old age.
